28 #ifndef _BGPDUMP_MSTREAM_H
29 #define _BGPDUMP_MSTREAM_H
30 
31 #include <sys/types.h>
32 #include <netinet/in.h>
33 
34 typedef struct mstream {
35  u_char *start;
36  u_int16_t position;
37  u_int32_t len;
38 } mstream_t;
39 
40 void mstream_init(struct mstream *s, u_char *buffer,u_int32_t len);
41 u_char mstream_getc(struct mstream *s, u_char *d);
42 u_int16_t mstream_getw(struct mstream *s, u_int16_t *d);
43 u_int32_t mstream_getl(struct mstream *s, u_int32_t *d);
44 struct in_addr mstream_get_ipv4(struct mstream *s);
45 u_int32_t mstream_can_read(struct mstream *s);
46 u_int32_t mstream_get (struct mstream *s, void *d, u_int32_t len);
47 mstream_t mstream_copy(mstream_t *s, int len);
48 
49 #endif
mstream
